price: Wa mwemeramana mu bantu ba Firawuni, yarongeye guhanura abantu biwe ati: “Emwe bantu banje! Enda rero nyabuna nimunkundire munkurikire, mpeze ndabarongore mu nzira ibereye y’ubugororotsi;
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُونِ أَهۡدِكُمۡ سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī āmana yāqawmi ittabiʿūni ahdikum sabīla al-rashādi
